sentences.en: A crowd gathered to watch the fight.
sentences.cn: 一群人聚拢来围观打架。

sentences.en: All the members of the family gather to enjoy a reunion dinner.
sentences.cn: 全家人聚在一起吃团圆饭.

sentences.en: During the air raids, we gathered the children around us and sang songs.
sentences.cn: 空袭期间，我们把孩子们聚集在身边唱歌。

sentences.en: Flowers are often fertilized by bees as they gather nectar.
sentences.cn: 花常在蜜蜂采蜜时受粉。

sentences.en: From these trifles you can gather what kind of person he is.
sentences.cn: 从这些小事上,你可以想见他的为人.

sentences.en: Gather the skirt at the waist.
sentences.cn: 在裙子的腰部打褶。

sentences.en: Gather the waist in a little more with fine stitches.
sentences.cn: 用密针脚把腰部收进一点.

sentences.en: Gather ye rosebuds while ye may.
sentences.cn: 花开堪折直须折。

sentences.en: Give me a few minutes to gather my thoughts together.
sentences.cn: 给我几分钟,让我把思绪集中一下.

sentences.en: I gather his report is highly critical of the trial judge.
sentences.cn: 据我所知，他在报道中毫不留情地批评了初审法官。

sentences.en: I suggest we gather enough firewood to last the night.
sentences.cn: 我建议大家捡足够多的木柴来撑过这一晚。

sentences.en: People would gather from near and far.
sentences.cn: 人们会从四面八方聚到一起。

sentences.en: The researcher’s job is to gather information about people.
sentences.cn: 这位研究人员的工作是收集人们的信息。

sentences.en: The teacher went round the class to gather the papers.
sentences.cn: 老师在教室里走了一圈收试卷.

sentences.en: The wind rose and the clouds began to gather.
sentences.cn: 风起云涌.

sentences.en: They were granted a delay of 48 hours to gather more evidence.
sentences.cn: 准许他们迟延48小时,以收集更多的证据.

sentences.en: Thousands of people gathered outside the embassy.
sentences.cn: 大使馆外面聚集了数千人。

sentences.en: You must gather your strength for the journey.
sentences.cn: 你必须为这次行程打起精神来。

sentences.en: You should gather yourself together firstly under conditions of great danger.
sentences.cn: 在极其危险的情况下你应当先控制住自己.

sentences.en: You two know each other, I gather.
sentences.cn: 我想你们俩认识。

trans.tran_en: a small fold produced by pulling cloth together

trans.tran_cn: 聚集，收集，搜集，收割，理解，逐渐增加，集中，给…打褶
trans.tran_en: to come together and form a group, or to make people do this
to come together and form a group, or to make people do this
